column3: Latest;Stung Treng: A------ suspect was arrested for possession of illegal substances at 12:30 am on January 8
column7: Stung Treng Town.------The suspect was identified as Roth Sieng Hun
column9: a farmer from  Koh Phnov village
column11: Stung Treng province.------105.25 grams of methamphetamine were seized.------Currently
column12: the suspect is in the custody of the Anti-Narcotics Bureau
column13: and a case is being filed and send to the provincial court. The search continues for suspected accomplices. ------https://www.postnews.com.kh/local/403050
